title: S16 Ep98: Supernatural News/Parashare: Rise of the Witch Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Rise of the Witch Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/ParaShare Rise of the Witch Edition!

Dave & Tim explore the strange supernatural news from around the world and share your emailed encounters with the paranormal. This week there is a rise in Witch stories, from new TV series, unusual rituals, a Salem Witch pardon and the rise of WitchTok, A.I. Restores health and lost voices, The Return of Michael Jacksons ghost and MORE! Plus your stories of ghosts, out of body experiences, possible time shifts and other true tales.

Visit Dave & Tim this weekend at : www.MIParaCon.com

Get cool paranormal books and swag here: www.darknessradio.com/store
